abstract: A new poll shows that New York State residents are almost evenly divided on natural gas drilling. Opposition is stronger upstate, but the question remains whether it is potent enough for New York to do what no state has done: turn away the gas industry's favored technology.

headline.main: The Fracking Divide: Who Will Prevail in N.Y.?
